name: cnngp

stmt.origin: mpbir3an(wcel(ccnfld, cngp), wcel(ccnfld, cgrp), wcel(ccnfld, cms), wss(ccom(cabs, cmin), ccom(cabs, cmin)))
stmt.pretty: mpbir3an(CCfld ∈ NrmGrp, CCfld ∈ Grp, CCfld ∈ MetSp, (abs ∘ -)⊆(abs ∘ -))

body.origin:
|- wcel(ccnfld, cngp)
-| wcel(ccnfld, cgrp)
-| wcel(ccnfld, cms)
-| wss(ccom(cabs, cmin), ccom(cabs, cmin))
-| wb(wcel(ccnfld, cngp), w3a(wcel(ccnfld, cgrp), wcel(ccnfld, cms), wss(ccom(cabs, cmin), ccom(cabs, cmin))))
body.pretty:
⊢ CCfld ∈ NrmGrp
⊣ CCfld ∈ Grp
⊣ CCfld ∈ MetSp
⊣ (abs ∘ -)⊆(abs ∘ -)
⊣ (CCfld ∈ NrmGrp ↔(CCfld ∈ Grp ∧ CCfld ∈ MetSp ∧(abs ∘ -)⊆(abs ∘ -)))

|- wb(wcel(ccnfld, cngp), w3a(wcel(ccnfld, cgrp), wcel(ccnfld, cms), wss(ccom(cabs, cmin), ccom(cabs, cmin))))
-| wceq(cabs, cfv(cnm, ccnfld))
-| wceq(cmin, cfv(csg, ccnfld))
-| wceq(ccom(cabs, cmin), cfv(cds, ccnfld))
body.pretty:
⊢ (CCfld ∈ NrmGrp ↔(CCfld ∈ Grp ∧ CCfld ∈ MetSp ∧(abs ∘ -)⊆(abs ∘ -)))
⊣ abs =(norm ` CCfld)
⊣ - =(-g ` CCfld)
⊣ (abs ∘ -)=(dist ` CCfld)
